column5: Our resort home is great for couples, business travelers, and families. 3340 sq ft of beautifully decorated fun on a fully fenced 22,000 sq ft back yard on a green belt! Outdoor kitchen, heated spa, pool, 5 HD TV's, Transportation to the Super Bowl included. Wine bar, stocked pantry and fridge. Private parking for up to 10 cars. We accept all major credit cards.
